text.section: An applicant shall pay to the Department at the time of making application, a fee of $30. An applicant who fails any examination, shall pay an additional fee of $20 for each subsequent examination the applicant takes.
A tree expert license shall be renewed annually. A person who holds a license and wishes to renew it shall pay a $10 annual renewal fee.

Fees the Department receives shall be paid into the State Treasury for the Department's use. The Secretary shall prepare an annual report on the number of licenses issued and the receipts and expenses under Part III of this subtitle during each fiscal year.
